alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 29 at 3:47AM PST until December 29 at 4:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON ABOVE 5000 FEET... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Wet snow occurring. Plan on slippery road conditions. Tree branches could fall as well. Wet snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches are expected. * WHERE...San Diego County Mountains above 5000 feet. * WHEN...Until 4 PM today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for reduced visibilities at times. Snow levels will rise for this afternoon and tonight with most of the precipitation in the form of rain after this afternoon. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for wet snow means periods of wet snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
